newsitem.title: USA: Astea International Inc Q3 net falls.
newsitem.headline: Astea International Inc Q3 net falls.

text.p: NOTE: Company completed an acquisition with Abalon AB on June 28, 1996. The acquisition was accounted for as a purchase transaction. On Februanry 27, 1996, the company completed a merger with Bendata Inc, which was accounted for as a pooling of interests.
1996 nine month period includes $3,416,000 of merger expenses ($2,609,000 after-tax) from the Bandata merger and a $13.8 million charge from the Abalon purchase.

Prior to Astea's acquisition of Bendata and the first seven months of 1995 for Astea, both companies were taxed as subchapter S corporations. 1996 nine month periods include a charge of $575,000 for the reinstatement of a deferred income tax liability for Bendata. Excluding this charge, the Company recorded an income tax benefit of $267,000, or an effective tax rate of 15.5 percent.
The pro forma excludes charges and shows as if the companies were taxed as C corporations.
